roadway_dispersion
Class point_vector

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--roadway_dispersion.point_vector
public class point_vector
extends java.lang.Object

point_vector class provides a modular and flexible way to generate point source locations for use in the huang/roadway dispersion model. Point locations can be created by specifying the spacing between two end points or by specifying a functional of point placement between end point allowing the user to select the total number of points.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tony Held

Method Detail

add_points

public void add_points(double lower_bound,
                       double upper_bound,
                       double spacing)
add_points based on a lower bound, upper bound, & desired point spacing. When spacing is specified the points will always be equidistant (i.e. linear algorithm used). Points will be equally centered on the mid point of the range.
Parameters:
lower_bound - a double value representing the lowest point value to add
upper_bound - a double value representing the upper point value to add
spacing - an double value indicating the distance between equaly spaced points

add_points

public void add_points(double lower_bound,
                       double upper_bound,
                       int num_points,
                       int function_type)
add_points based on a lower bound, upper bound, function type, & total number of points desired
Parameters:
lower_bound - a double value representing the lowest point value to add
upper_bound - a double value representing the upper point value to add
num_points - an int value specifying the total number of points to be added
function_type - an int value indicating the type of profile characteristics of the points to be added.

add_points

public void add_points(double point_location)
Add a single point to the vector.

getPoint_array

public double[] getPoint_array()
getPoint_array calls create_array() which will create a type double array to return the contents of the point_profile vector.

toString in class java.lang.Object

create_array

private void create_array()
Create an array of primative type double from the point_vector internal vector. This will save space and speed calculations for subsequent manipulation. This method will always be called prior to the getPoint_array method.
